name: Walle-Eva
description:
Created BY: Declan McClintock With Assets from MSU.

Modifications made by Armando Marques da S Sobrinho:

- created the first and second levels in class

- created a well-crafted third level

 - The game at this level has a hall with three floors, it has a lot of enemies without any changes, that is, with the same invincibility for all.

Created a ramp to access the 2nd floor

Created an elevator to access the room on the second floor where you have the key and access to the third floor where the victory trophy is located.

Created a deadly zone with its respective script, as the hall in some of its rooms has no wall, so be careful not to fall out of the hall.

I created a distribution for Linux.

It was pretty cool to play.

Enjoy!!!
